moves.name: Aromatic Mist
moves.effect: Raises an ally's Insight by 1.

moves.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Strength by 1. This move has Priority.

moves.name: Charm
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Strength by 2.

moves.name: Crafty Shield
moves.effect: Protects the user and its allies from status moves for one turn.

moves.name: Dazzling Gleam
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

moves.name: Disarming Voice
moves.effect: This move cannot miss.

moves.name: Draining Kiss
moves.effect: The user regains HP equal to 75% of the damage dealt.

moves.name: Fairy Lock
moves.effect: Prevents all Pokémon on the field from switching out on the next turn.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.effect: No additional effects.

moves.name: Fleur Cannon
moves.effect: After use, the user's Special is lowered by 2.

moves.name: Flower Shield
moves.effect: Raises the Vitality of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field by 1.

moves.name: Geomancy
moves.effect: Requires one turn to charge. On the second turn, the user's Special, Insight, and Dexterity are raised by 2.

moves.name: Guardian of Alola
moves.effect: Z-Move. Deals damage equal to 75% of the target's current HP.

moves.name: Light of Ruin
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to half of the damage it deals.

moves.name: Misty Terrain
moves.effect: Creates a Misty Terrain for 5 rounds. Grounded Pokémon are protected from status conditions and the power of Dragon-type moves is halved.

moves.name: Moonblast
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Special is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Moonlight
moves.effect: The user recovers HP. The amount depends on the weather (more in Sun, less in other weather).

moves.name: Nature's Madness
moves.effect: Deals damage equal to half of the target's current HP.

moves.name: Play Rough
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Strength is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Spirit Break
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the target's Special is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Strange Steam
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Confused.

moves.name: Sweet Kiss
moves.effect: The target is Confused. This move has a high chance of missing.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.effect: Lowers the Evasion of all adjacent opponents by 1.
